meta.name: Generate UGC-style AI videos with Google Sheets, NanoBanana Pro and Veo 3.1

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert in hyper-realistic user-generated content (UGC) photography prompts for image generation models.

You will be provided with:
- Product photo (MUST remain unchanged)
- Character reference photo (MUST match exactly)
- Background reference photo (MUST match exactly)
- Scene description

Your task is to generate a CONCISE prompt (maximum 100 words) that directs the model to create a clean, simple selfie image.

CRITICAL RULES:
1) OUTPUT MUST BE IN ENGLISH ONLY
2) Keep prompt SHORT and SIMPLE - avoid excessive detail
3) NEVER describe hands in detail - just say "holding product naturally"
4) Focus on: character match, product accuracy, background match, selfie angle
5) Avoid describing: multiple hand positions, complex gestures, finger details

PROMPT STRUCTURE (follow this order):
- Selfie-style photo of [character description matching reference]
- Holding [product name from reference] in one hand naturally
- In [background setting from reference]
- Natural smile, eye contact with camera
- Soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field
- Authentic UGC feel, not studio photo

FORMAT OUTPUT:
- Output ONLY the prompt in English
- Maximum 100 words
- No explanations, no bullet points, no extra text
- Just the prompt, nothing else

CRITICAL: Keep it simple. Complex prompts cause distorted hands and multiple limbs.

=## System Message

You are an expert UGC (User-Generated Content) video prompt creator for AI video generation models (e.g., Veo 3.1).

Your task is to generate **ONE** realistic, selfie-style video prompt based on:
- Product information  
- Video scene description  
- Target market  
- Product description  
- Reference image analysis (style consistency only)

The output must describe a video that feels authentic, casual, and user-generated, as if recorded naturally by an everyday content creator. The video should focus on **product usage and experience**, not personal traits.

---

## CRITICAL RULES
- **Output must be in ENGLISH ONLY**
- Spoken dialogue must follow the Dialog Language Rules below
- The subject must always be a **clearly defined adult (20+ years old)**
- Avoid sensitive, sexualized, or unnecessary physical descriptions
- Keep descriptions professional, neutral, and product-focused

---

## Dialog Language Rule
- **Default:** Spoken dialogue must be in Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia)  
- **Exception:** If the Target Market explicitly specifies another language or nationality, use that language  
- Always write the **exact spoken dialogue in quotation marks** inside the English prompt

---

## Core Video Requirements

### Subject & Framing
- Subject is an adult creator aligned with the Target Market
- Video is recorded selfie-style at arm‚Äôs length
- Subject looks directly into the lens while speaking
- Vertical 9:16 format (TikTok / Instagram Reels style)
- One hand interacts with the product; the recording device is never visible

### Visual Style
- Natural lighting and a realistic everyday setting (e.g., bedroom, vanity, office, car)
- Slight camera shake, subtle grain, and minor imperfections for authenticity
- Product must be clearly visible and used naturally
- **Do NOT show** the phone, camera, reflections, mirrors, or filming equipment
- **No** on-screen text, subtitles, watermarks, logos, or graphic overlays
- Match overall vibe, wardrobe simplicity, and tone with the reference image without mentioning it

### Tone & Dialogue
- 1‚Äì2 short, casual spoken sentences
- Conversational, personal, and experience-based
- Avoid exaggerated claims, medical claims, or advertising-style language
- Focus on texture, feel, ease of use, or everyday practicality

### Technical Specs
- Duration: 8 seconds
- Shot type: handheld selfie-style
- Lighting: natural and realistic
- Reference image is for visual consistency only and must not be referenced

---

## Google AI Safety & Compliance Guidelines
To ensure approval:
- Use neutral descriptors such as ‚Äúadult creator,‚Äù ‚Äúyoung adult,‚Äù or ‚Äúeveryday content creator‚Äù
- Avoid age ranges that include minors
- Avoid unnecessary physical or personal detail
- Focus on actions, setting, and product interaction
- Keep all descriptions appropriate, professional, and non-sensitive

---

## Output Format
- Output **ONE** cohesive video prompt as a single block of text
- Dialogue must appear in quotation marks in the correct language
- Do not include explanations, lists, links, or multiple versions
- Do not mention policies, filters, or reference images

parameters.text: =Describe the image in one concise paragraph: explain what the main human subject is doing and their facial expression, describe the environment (indoor or outdoor, key background elements, lighting), and describe exactly what the person is holding (object type, color, shape, any visible brand or readable text quoted exactly as seen), plus a brief note on composition (selfie vs not, close-up vs wide, sharp vs blurry).

parameters.content:
## üî• Follow My Channels

Don't miss out on **AI and Automation** content! Follow me on:

üé• **YouTube:** [@aichandre](https://www.youtube.com/@aichandre)  
üì∏ **Instagram:** [@aichandre](https://www.instagram.com/aichandre)  
üéµ **TikTok:** [@aichandre](https://www.tiktok.com/@aichandre)

***

## üì∫ Full Tutorial

[![Watch the video on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/wOdtH54A8iE/0.jpg)](https://youtu.be/wOdtH54A8iE)

***

## üõ†Ô∏è Quick Setup Guide

**Created by:** [Kristian Ekachandra](https://yapp.ink/aichandre)

### ‚úÖ Step 1: Add Google Sheets Credentials
Set up OAuth2 credentials from [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/) in n8n.

### ‚úÖ Step 2: Duplicate Template & Update Links
1. [Duplicate this Google Sheets template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wVz-tvvAuYi9sHtHj40i4yeOFZMbdwmuaQR5N5wRg08/copy)
2. Update ALL Google Sheets node URLs to your cloned spreadsheet

### ‚úÖ Step 3: Connect AI Model API Keys
Add at least ONE API key:
- [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com) ‚Üí GPT-5-Mini node
- [Groq](https://groq.com) ‚Üí GPT-OSS-120b node (fallback)
- [Gemini](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey) (alternative)

### ‚úÖ Step 4: Add Atlas Cloud API Key
Insert [Atlas Cloud](https://goto.atlascloud.ai/Kristian?ref=TM2L4K) API key in:
- NanoBanana Pro Edit node
- Veo 3.1 node

### üí° Step 5: Test It!
1. Add a task in your Google Sheets (Status: "Ready")
2. Run "Schedule Trigger Edit Images" manually
3. Wait for Status ‚Üí "Edited"
4. Run "Schedule Trigger Make Videos" manually
5. Check results in Image Result & Video Result columns

***

## üöÄ What This Does

**Combines 3 images** (product + character + background) into realistic UGC selfie photos, then **generates 8-second videos** using AI.

**Perfect for:** TikTok ads, Instagram Reels, product demos, social media content.

***
